full_summary:
================

**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Advertising Services**

**Reference Number**: WS3679791031-Doc4188233519

**Amendment Number**: 3

**Public Release Date**: September 15, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time**: November 8, 2023 at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**Government Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**:
Christopher Ivany (SPAC/PSPC)
christopher.ivany@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17464938?extsite=MTc0NjQ5MzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Summary of Requirements**: The Government of Canada is seeking offers from interested offerors for advertising services. Successful offerors will be prequalified for a Supply Arrangement for a period of approximately three years with the option to extend for up to three one-year periods.

**Service Categories**: The RFSO encompasses four categories of services:

* General Stream:
	+ Category A: A full-service agency with expertise in creative and media planning will be selected.
	+ Category B: Creative service providers for advertising-related projects.
* Indigenous Stream:
	+ Category A: A full-service agency with expertise in creative and media planning will be selected.
	+ Category B: Creative service providers for advertising-related projects.

**Note**: The Notice URL provided above is for informational purposes only. Offerors are required to submit their bids via the Ariba Discovery website using the designated RFX number: RFX-17464938.

**Documentation**: The RFSO and support documentation may be downloaded from the Notice URL above.

Please note that only through this procurement will the successful offerors be qualified for a contract of approximately three years with the option to extend for up to three periods of year.
